𓀋 craft

𓍍 𓀀 craftmen prefix مَنْصِب manṣib "position" уме́ние uménije 𓀋 𓏥 "craft" 𒉆𒉣𒈨𒋳 nam-gašam namgašam craftsmanship 𒉆𒀿 nam-ašgab namašgab the craft of the leather-worker
𒉆𒌆𒌓 nam-azlag namazlag the craft of the fuller
𒉆𒀀𒍪 nam-a-zu namazu the craft of the physicians
𒉆𒁶 nam-šidim namšidim the craft of the builder 𒉆𒌣 nam-simug namsimug the craft of the smith 𒉆𒇽𒁷𒈾 nam-lu₂kurun-na namlukurunak craft of the brewer 𒉆𒀜𒆤 nam-ad-KID the craft of the basket-weaver namadKID nomad?
